items.sentence: Aiden was very awkward while talking to the door.
I was very balmy while in the shower while wearing a onesie.
I didn't falter when I said 1 plus 1 equals 3.
My plan was foolproof when I was jumping off a cliff.
My day was gloomy when we lost our hockey game with a score of 10 to nothing.
There was no mistaking that jaunty walk.
I robbed a bank to steal all the jewelry.
I went to bed at nightfall.
Birds were hurrying to their evening roosts.
The curling game was very saucy after the Canadians cheated.
She was shrewd enough to guess the motive behind his gesture.
Her plan provoked a loud squawk from her friends.
